item.title: Floor Plans
item.description: 2 Bedroom - 2 Bathroom 2 Bedroom - 2.5 Bathroom 3 Bedroom - 2 Bathroom Each residence at The Cliffs has its own front door for maximum privacy and convenience, so you will never have to walk down a long corridor. View Current Availability Virtual Tour
